modName: Remove stuck Journal Quests - Collect Bounty from Skald and more
summary:
If you have the Journal Entry

Collect Bounty from Skald

and it will not delete, this is the mod for you :)
descriptionHtml:
Are you stuck with Journal entries that will not delete????

I have created an .ESP mod file that removes the entries from the journal.

Collect Bounty from Skald

Kill the Giant located at \"someplace\"

Kill the dragon located at \"someplace\"

--------------------------------------------
How to:
--------------------------------------------
1. install the mod file to the DATA folder.
2. activate the mod file using the launcher (PC) or SKYRIM.INI (PS3)
3. load your game (tested and compiled for version 1.8.151.0)
4. check your log entry is removed.
5. save the game
6. quit the game
7. remove/deactivate the mod file (if you want to)
8. load your game (ignore the message)
9. Play ^_^
--------------------------------------------

List of Fixed Quest Journal Entries

BOUNTY QUESTS;
Bounty: Giant (BQ03)
Bounty: Bandit Boss (BQ01)
Bounty: Forsworn (BQ02)
Bounty: Dragon (BQ04)

FAVOR QUESTS;
Kill the Bandit Leader (Favor104)
Kill the Vampire (Favor109)
Rare Gifts (Favor110)
Kill the Forsworn Leader (Jarl) (Favor151)
Kill the Giant (Jarl) (Favor153)
Kill the Bandit Leader (Jarl) (Favor154)
Dungeon Delving (Jarl - Hagravens) (Favor157)
Dungeon Delving (Jarl - Caves) (Favor158)

FREEFORM QUESTS;
attempt to fix Dragon Hunting (FreeformSkyHavenTempleB)


For Support contact seifer69er:
BAHAMUT07@LIVE.COM.AU
